ComicInfo.Series: Sir Edward Grey, Witchfinder: In the Service of Angels
ComicInfo.Summary: In the Service of Angels [Chapter 2]: Grey is taken through London's underground tunnels to the office of The Captain, who then leads a party to the house of a medium named Mary.
